video.title: The Flash
video.synopsis: A forensics expert who wakes from a coma with amazing new powers squares off against forces threatening the city in this live-action superhero romp.

episodes.synopsis: Waking from a coma, Barry harnesses his newfound extraordinary speed to combat another metahuman who uses his power over the weather to loot banks.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Barry takes on multiple gunmen who storm an awards ceremony he's attending with Iris, but side effects from his new superpower catch up to him.
episodes.title: Fastest Man Alive

episodes.synopsis: The Flash and Joe track a deadly metahuman whose specialty is poisonous gases, and Caitlin relives the night of the explosion that killed her fiancé.
episodes.title: Things You Can't Outrun

episodes.synopsis: To steal a priceless diamond, Captain Cold acquires a specialized gun that can slay the Flash. Meanwhile, Joe disapproves of Iris and Eddie dating.
episodes.title: Going Rogue

episodes.synopsis: While he tries to persuade Iris to stop blogging about the Flash, Barry investigates an army general's connection to a metahuman with explosive power.
episodes.title: Plastique

episodes.synopsis: Barry takes on his former childhood bully, who can now turn himself into steel. In her blog, Iris finally coins the moniker "the Flash."
episodes.title: The Flash Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Using his metahuman power to siphon electricity, Blackout robs Barry of his speed, then sets his vindictive sights on S.T.A.R. labs and Dr. Wells.
episodes.title: Power Outage

episodes.synopsis: The Arrow arrives to help the Flash investigate a lethal boomerang, but a metahuman who can control emotions turns the Flash against his former pal.
episodes.title: Flash vs. Arrow

episodes.synopsis: The Flash finally gets a chance to confront the Reverse-Flash, the man who killed his mother. Caitlin gets surprising news about her fiancé, Ronnie.
episodes.title: The Man in the Yellow Suit

episodes.synopsis: While the Flash prepares to vanquish the Reverse-Flash, Captain Cold and Heat Wave team up to kidnap Caitlin and lure the Flash to his doom.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Rogues

episodes.synopsis: An embittered former protégé of Dr. Wells uses sound waves to attack the Flash. Meanwhile, Iris faces trouble in her new job as a reporter.
episodes.title: The Sound and the Fury

episodes.synopsis: The Flash takes on a teleporting metahuman, Cisco investigates Ronnie's fate, and a telepathic gorilla runs amok in the city sewer system.
episodes.title: Crazy for You

episodes.synopsis: The Flash hunts for a dangerously transformed Ronnie after he attacks a scientist, and Joe and Cisco reinvestigate Nora Allen's murder.
episodes.title: The Nuclear Man

episodes.synopsis: Gen. Eiling attempts to use Ronnie and Dr. Stein for his supersoldier project, and Barry confronts the possibility that he has traveled through time.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: A metahuman who can control the weather targets Joe to avenge the death of his brother. Cisco learns the truth about the Reverse-Flash.
episodes.title: Out of Time

episodes.synopsis: The Flash travels back in time to prevent a catastrophic tidal wave, but the time warp sparks another attack from Captain Cold and Heat Wave.
episodes.title: Rogue Time

episodes.synopsis: The Flash pursues the Trickster and the copycat villain who broke him out of jail. Barry discovers the truth about Dr. Wells.
episodes.title: Tricksters

episodes.synopsis: Felicity Smoak and the Atom team up with the Flash to take on a metahuman who's using swarms of robotic bees to attack scientists.
episodes.title: All Star Team Up

episodes.synopsis: While Joe and Cisco intensify their investigation into Dr. Wells, the Flash faces Everyman, a metahuman who can morph into any person he touches.
episodes.title: Who Is Harrison Wells?

episodes.synopsis: After Barry glimpses the future, he and the others risk Cisco's safety in order to trick Dr. Wells into a confession.
episodes.title: The Trap

episodes.synopsis: After the powerfully telepathic gorilla Grodd forces Gen. Eiling to commit a robbery, the Flash and his team enter the city sewers to stop the beast.
episodes.title: Grodd Lives

episodes.synopsis: When he learns that Dr. Wells has reactivated the particle accelerator, the Flash asks Captain Cold for help saving the metahumans trapped inside it.
episodes.title: Rogue Air

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Wells offers Barry a tempting proposition: a chance to go back in time to save his mother. But the consequences could be catastrophic.
episodes.title: Fast Enough
